meanings.definition: Not magnetic; not attracted by a magnet.
meanings.sent1: The antimagnetic watch did not stick to the fridge.
meanings.sent2: The antimagnetic material did not get pulled towards the magnet.
meanings.sent3: The antimagnetic pencil refused to cling to the magnetic board.
meanings.sent4: Her antimagnetic personality repelled negativity effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The antimagnetic shield around the safe kept all magnetic interference away.

meanings.definition: A substance or material that is not affected by magnetic fields.
meanings.sent1: The antimagnetic in the lab was used to shield sensitive equipment.
meanings.sent2: The antimagnetic was crucial in protecting the electronics from magnetic interference.
meanings.sent3: The antimagnetic in the room made all the compasses go crazy!
meanings.sent4: His mind was like an antimagnetic, deflecting all external influences.
meanings.sent5: The antimagnetic coating on the spacecraft ensured it could navigate accurately in space.
